mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.name, u.nickname, u.email, u.role AS role, COUNT(b.id) AS qtyOfBoard FROM user u LEFT JOIN board b ON u.id = b.user_id GROUP BY u.id ORDER BY qtyOfBoard DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET role = #{role} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT b.id, u.nickname, b.title, b.created_At FROM board b LEFT OUTER JOIN user u ON user_id = u.id;
